skills.description: Increase Torpedo stat of Destroyers in the fleet by 5% (15%). Does not stack with other command skills that have similar effect.
When this ship fires its Torpedoes: 15% (30%) chance to launch a second wave of Torpedoes. (10s cooldown, starts on cooldown)
Every 12 (8) times the main gun is fired, triggers All Out Assault - Nagara Class I (II)

skills.description: When another ship in your fleet sinksIn-game does not state this, but another ship does have to sink, it will not trigger on fight startsinks[b] in combat, if this ship is the only ship remaining in your vanguardThe ship that sinks does not have to be in the vanguardvanguard[c], increase this ship's damage dealt by 20% (50%) and increaseAt level 10 only, changes to decrease, possible bugincrease[d] this ship's damage received by 8% (20%) until the end of the battle. (This skill cannot trigger more than once per battle.)

When the battle begins, and 15% (30%) chance every 15s after that, deploy a smokescreen that lasts for 5s. Allied ships inside the smokescreen gain 20% (40%) evasion rate. (This skill does not stack with any other smokescreen skill.)
While this ship is afloat: decreases the DMG your Flagship takes by 15% (25%).
Every 15 (10) times the main gun is fired, triggers All Out Assault - A-Class I (II).
